histore.archive.manager.descriptor module¶

Base classes for maintaining metadata about the archives that are controlled by an archive manager.

class histore.archive.manager.descriptor.ArchiveDescriptor(doc: Dict, validate: Optional[bool] = True)¶

Bases: object

Wrapper around an archive descriptor dictionary object. This class provides access to descriptor property values and their defaults.

static create(identifier: Optional[str] = None, name: Optional[str] = None, primary_key: Optional[List[int]] = None, description: Optional[str] = None, encoder: Optional[str] = None, decoder: Optional[str] = None, serializer: Optional[Union[Dict, Callable]] = None)¶

Create a new archive descriptor object.

Parameters

  • identifier (string, default=None) – Unique archive identifier.

  • name (string, default=None) – Descriptive name that is associated with the archive.

  • primary_key (list of int, default=None) – Identifier(s) for column(s) that are used to generate keys for rows in the archive.

  • description (string, default=None) – Optional long description that is associated with the archive.

  • encoder (string, default=None) – Full package path for the Json encoder class that is used by the persistent archive.

  • decoder (string, default=None) – Full package path for the Json decoder function that is used by the

  • serializer (dict or callable, default=None) – Dictionary or callable that returns a dictionary that contains the specification for the serializer. The serializer specification is a dictionary with the following elements: - clspath: Full package target path for the serializer class that is instantiated. - kwargs : Additional arguments that are passed to the constructor of the created serializer instance. Only clspath is required.

Returns

Return type

histore.archive.manager.base.ArchiveDescriptor

created_at() → datetime.datetime¶

Get creating timestamp for the archive.

Returns

Return type

datetime.datetime

decoder() → Callable¶

Get Json decoder function used by persistent archives.

Returns

Return type

callable

description() → str¶

Get archive description. If the value is not set in the descriptor an empty string is returned as default.

Returns

Return type

string

Get Json encoder used by persistent archives.

Returns

Return type

json.JSONEncoder

identifier() → str¶

Get the unique archive identifier value.

Returns

Return type

string

name() → str¶

Get the archive name. If the value is not set in the descriptor the identifier is returned as default.

Returns

Return type

string

primary_key() → List[int]¶

Get list of primary key attribute identifier(s).

Returns

Return type

list of int
